Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Nagel claims that prior to reflection, it is plausible that people cannot be morally assessed for:
unimportant to most people: their character.
not essential to our existence: what is due to factors beyond their control.
rarely viewed: actions that do not violate anyone’s rights.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: According to Cicero, immorality is __________, and expediency is __________.
essential to our existence: repugnant to Nature; repugnant to Nature.
unimportant to most people: repugnant to Nature; in accord with Nature.
not essential to our existence: in accord with Nature; repugnant to Nature.
rarely viewed: in accord with Nature; in accord with Nature.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: According to Socrates, just as there is a difference between what an ironic statement says and its true meaning, so also appearances differ from reality.  Even though societies or individuals appear to differ about what is required for the good life, that in no way contradicts the fact that:
essential to our existence: what is right or wrong, true or false varies from one culture to another.
unimportant to most people: appearances are the only real way we have for knowing reality.
not essential to our existence: the distinction of appearance and reality is the basis for the dialectical discovery of truth.
rarely viewed: there are objective principles for thought and action that are required for the good life.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: For the soft determinist, to say that you could have done otherwise is to say that you would have done otherwise if _____.
essential to our existence: your desires were always the same
unimportant to most people: your desires were completely under your control
not essential to our existence: your desires had been different
rarely viewed: your desires played no role in your decisions

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Which of the following concepts can be defined, according to Moore?
unimportant to most people: yellow
not essential to our existence: horse
rarely viewed: all of the above

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: The morality that Gauthier describes as facing a foundational crisis essentially involves:
unimportant to most people: pure altruism.
not essential to our existence: justified constraint.
rarely viewed: prima facie duties.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Epictetus claims that the desire for one’s loved ones to live forever is:
unimportant to most people: a sign of genuine love.
not essential to our existence: blasphemous.
rarely viewed: silly.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: To Kant, making a lying promise would be wrong because _____.
essential to our existence: lying to people can cause them harm
unimportant to most people: lying to people harms society
not essential to our existence: you could not consistently will that everyone should make lying promises
rarely viewed: most people condemn the practice

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Kant says that when trying to decide whether an action is morally permissible, we must ask if we can consistently will that the maxim of our action should become _____.
unimportant to most people: a contingent law
not essential to our existence: a universal law
rarely viewed: a rule of thumb

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: The theory that says mental states are nothing but brain states is known as _____.
unimportant to most people: epiphenominalism
not essential to our existence: identity theory
rarely viewed: logical behaviorism

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Hobbes claims that all of the laws of nature can be summarized in the precept:
unimportant to most people: never treat another person as a means to your ends.
not essential to our existence: do not do to another what you would not have done to yourself.
rarely viewed: practice virtue in all that you do.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Augustine claims that all created things are:
unimportant to most people: good when taken together, but not good separately.
not essential to our existence: good, even taken separately.
rarely viewed: none of the above.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Epictetus claims that if the wife and children of a virtuous man were to die, he should feel:
unimportant to most people: moderate grief.
not essential to our existence: undisturbed.
rarely viewed: envy of those who still have their loved ones.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Aristotle claims that:
essential to our existence: virtue is in our power, and so is vice.
unimportant to most people: virtue is in our power, but vice is not.
not essential to our existence: vice is in our power, but virtue is not.
rarely viewed: neither virtue nor vice is in our power.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Wolf claims that interpreting Kant’s ethics so that it consists of a finite set of constraints:
essential to our existence: yields an unattractive picture of moral sainthood.
unimportant to most people: implausibly places an “upper bound” on moral worthiness.
not essential to our existence: yields a theory that is too demanding.
rarely viewed: transforms the theory into a form of contractarianism.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: A prima facie duty is a characteristic of an act in virtue of which the act:
essential to our existence: seems to be right, although this might be illusory.
unimportant to most people: tends to be right, although this might be outweighed by other considerations.
not essential to our existence: is right.
rarely viewed: is the first thing that an agent ought to do, above all else.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Kant claims that the moral law is given to each person by:
unimportant to most people: one’s own will.
not essential to our existence: God.
rarely viewed: Nature.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Nussbaum claims that at the first stage of ethical inquiry, terms for the virtues should be:
unimportant to most people: those that are conventionally used.
not essential to our existence: neutral between competing specifications of the virtue.
rarely viewed: none of the above.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: Mill claims that the principle of utility:
essential to our existence: can be proven from self-evident principles.
unimportant to most people: can be proven from principles that are known empirically.
not essential to our existence: cannot be proven, and this is a unique problem for the theory.
rarely viewed: cannot be proven, but this is common to all first principles.

Aesthetics deals with objects that are__: When Euthyphro attempts to define the holy as prosecuting wrongdoers, Socrates objects that:
essential to our existence: there are many other things that are also holy.
unimportant to most people: prosecuting wrongdoers is not always holy.
not essential to our existence: there is disagreement about what counts as “wrongdoing.”
rarely viewed: all of the above.
